entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:21 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 10:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -19.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -24.4°C
Wind: E 61 km/h gust 73 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Blowing snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the evening and after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
